definition: fourth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/fourth in order/letter "D" or Roman "IV" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 195°/butyl/cubes (of food)

sentences.english: The Gulf of Aden and the east coast of Somalia accounted for 130 of this year’s attacks.
sentences.chinese: 索馬里的亞丁灣和東海岸今年遭遇130次的攻擊。

sentences.english: Three vessels have just completed an anti - piracy tour in the Gulf of Aden .
sentences.chinese: 三首軍艦在亞丁灣巡洋剛剛全部完成了反海盜的任務。

sentences.english: Kouchner says the European ships would reach the Gulf of Aden sometime in December.
sentences.chinese: 庫什內說，歐盟軍艦可以在12月抵達亞丁灣。

sentences.english: Supply ship Qiandaohu docks at Gulf of Aden.
sentences.chinese: 千島湖補給艦停靠亞丁灣。

sentences.english: The survivors said their bodies were thrown overboard in the Gulf of Aden," Redmond added.
sentences.chinese: 倖存者說，他們的屍體從船上扔到亞丁灣裏。

sentences.english: From there they sailed a short distance across the Gulf of Aden to Somalia.
sentences.chinese: 在那裏他們經過短暫航行跨越了亞丁灣，抵達索馬里。

sentences.english: Migrants often hire smugglers to take them across the Gulf of Aden or Red Sea.
sentences.chinese: 移民們通常僱傭走私船搭載他們渡過亞丁灣或紅海。
